summary: A patch for some users (including those using that excellent child appearance improvement mod) who complain of Aeta walking around wearing almost next to nothing in the snow; possibly a clothing bug in the DLC. Requires Update 1.8.151.0 and Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ffa500]Requires Update 1.8.151.0 and Dragonborn.[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]THIS NOT-FOR PROFIT MOD CAN BE DOWNLOADED AND USED FREE OF CHARGE[/color][/b][/b]

A patch for some users (including those using that excellent child appearance improvement mod called XVC) who complain of Aeta walking around wearing almost next to nothing in the snow; possibly a clothing bug in the DLC.

I came up with this fix, and so I fired up CK and fixed her clothes to a child's regular dress because her unique set doesn't appear at all.

[color=yellow][b]Recommended Mod:[/b] MadCat221 has released a mod that allows Aeta to wear Skaal cold-weather gear, thus making it more lore-friendly:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31741/[/color]

[b]Notices:[/b]
Cannot be altered or modified without prior permission. Distribution is limited only to Nexus.
author: sa547

files.name: Dragonborn Aeta Clothing Fix
files.changelogHtml: Fixed issue with Aeta's dress by using regular children's clothing set.
